effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 900,250 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 333,718.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Summon a Bursting Lightspawn which sacrifices its health to unleash Bursts of Light, inflicting 853,607 Holy damage split between nearby enemies every 2 sec while it lives. (2 Min Cooldown)

Use: Become Mudborne, absorbing 10.8 million damage and pulsing 534,340 Nature damage split between nearby enemies over 10 sec.

Periodic damage you take coalesces into pungent mud to feed the ritual, reducing this cooldown by 2.0 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
